title: HTX, Poloniex Assets are '100% Safe' Says Justin Sun After $200M Hack
description: Both exchanges lost a combined total of more than $200 million in a series of hacks last month.

title: UK crypto growth outstrips that of other major nations
description: The UK is seeing a much faster increase in growth than all the other major nations as far as crypto is concerned.

title: Has ChatGPT Lost its Mojo? Users Report “Lazy” Responses
description: ChatGPT is now causing frustration for many users. title: Web3 gaming: a 2023 industry overview
description: A new report from the Blockchain Gaming Alliance reveals an optimistic future for the web3 gaming industry and a concerning gender imbalance among players.

title: Bitcoin Bull Run Imminent? USDT Surge on Exchanges Opens Buying Opportunities

title: Bitcoin and Ether Tumble, Triggering $500M in Liquidations Amidst Cryptocurrency Market Volatility
description: Following the market’s retracement, crypto futures traders lost over $500 million in liquidation positions. Bitcoin’s slip from $43,000 to local support of $40,000 has triggered a wider drop led by Cardano (ADA), Solana (SOL), and Ethereum (ETH). title: Binance and Zhao Counter SEC’s Notice and Legal Tactics
description:
Binance and former CEO Changpeng Zhao filed a response to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) recent notice of supplemental authority filed on December 8, describing it as an “impermissible supplemental brief that identifies no new authority.” The filing response claimed that the SEC’s notice was improper and impermissible, citing that the SEC failed […]
